hero.heading: Your brand. Your logic. Our infrastructure.
hero.descrip: Get full control with SimpliFi’s Cards as a Service solution. Whether you're a fintech building a new product or an enterprise launching custom spend tools, our infrastructure powers every layer so you can create exactly what you need. From onboarding flows to KYC, from tokenization to fraud management, we’ve got the backend covered. You own the experience.

clientMarquee.heading: Trusted by fintechs, startups, and enterprises across MENA

careerPositions.title: Modular by design
careerPositions.descrip: Pick the layers you need and skip what you don’t. Build faster without compromising on your vision.

careerPositions.title: Made to scale
careerPositions.descrip: Handle millions of transactions, complex approval flows, and real-time controls without friction.

careerPositions.title: Fully white-label
careerPositions.descrip: Your branding. Your workflows. We stay invisible so your brand stays front and center.

careerPositions.title: Built for compliance
careerPositions.descrip: We handle KYC, AML, 3DS, PCI-DSS, and more so you can focus on your product.

useCases.title: Our stack
useCases.descrip: Choose the layers you need. We’ll handle the rest.

features.title: Frontend
features.description: Build your own cardholder and admin interfaces using our APIs. Enable real-time controls, card management, and custom workflows within your platform.

features.title: Backend
features.description: Powerful APIs and webhooks for issuing, managing, and tracking cards. Easy integration with your systems.

features.title: Regulatory
features.description: KYC, AML, and ongoing compliance covered. Stay compliant from day one.

features.title: Card Operations
features.description: We handle BIN sponsorship, funds management, and settlement. You focus on the experience.

features.title: Support
features.description: Guidance from onboarding to launch. We assist with setup, integration, and daily operations.

footer.heading: Ready to build your own card program?
footer.subheading: We’ll provide the infrastructure, APIs, and compliance support. You build what matters.
